para.programlisting:
<xs:schema xmlns:http="http://expath.org/ns/http-client" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://www.zorba-xquery.com/modules/image/image" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xs:annotation xml:lang="en"> <xs:documentation> This schema defines the different types used in the modules under: http://www.zorba-xquery.com/modules/images/ </xs:documentation> </xs:annotation>
<xs:simpleType name="imageType"> <xs:annotation xml:lang="en"> <xs:documentation> This type defines the different names that are allowed for image types. </xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="GIF"/> <xs:enumeration value="PNG"/> <xs:enumeration value="JPEG"/> <xs:enumeration value="TIFF"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
